energy-drinks.name: BERRY BLUE
energy-drinks.details: A mix of sweet fruit flavors and the intense rush of our energy blend. Grab a can and get invigorated with every sip.

energy-drinks.name: FROST
energy-drinks.details: We call it The OG, but it's better known as Frost. A light citrus taste with a crisp and clean finish, you can never go wrong with the original 3D Energy Drink.

energy-drinks.name: CITRUS DEW
energy-drinks.details: We kept the citrus blend light here, but never skimp on the energy. Enjoy a refreshing finish with all the rush you expect from 3D.

energy-drinks.name: LIBERTY POP
energy-drinks.details: A cyclone of deliciousness. Take yourself back to your childhood with the most patriotic of flavors.
